Name: HarmonEy

The protagonist's wife Ayako Ichinose Height： 163cm　Blood type： O type　Nickname： Ako Favorite things： Husband, sweet things Dislike： Things that interfere with my time with my husband Hobbies： Fun and playing with my husband Pros： carefree Disadvantages： Self-deterioration at home (also cute) Weakness： Insect Liquor： Quite strong A member of society who works hard in peacetime and is the wife of the main character. Housework is in charge of washing and cleaning, and cooking is left to the husband. It's not that I can't cook, but I only cook occasionally because I'm late to go home. It's surprisingly expressive with a lot of overreactions, but as a result, it has a personality that makes it easy to understand what you are thinking.
